snippet: Utah officials announced plans for a long-shot bid for another Winter Olympics, saying they already have the venues in place and have left behind the taint of scandal from the 2002 Games.
lead_paragraph: Utah officials announced plans for a long-shot bid for another Winter Olympics, saying they already have the venues in place and have left behind the taint of scandal from the 2002 Games.

headline.main: Utah Announces Bid for 2026 Winter Olympics
headline.print_headline: Utah Announces Bid for 2026 Winter Olympics
